page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: The main built up area in our block is the village of Balloch.We also take in part of Culloden.The Culloden area has been built only in the last few years and the building is still continuing.The rest of our area is made of farm land and forestry. There are some crofts in our area but many of the crofts have been joined together to form farms and others are being de- crofted and will in the future be ordinary houses.Few people work in our area and most of the people who live here work either in Inverness or Ardersier where Macdermotts make oil production platforms.The railway line to Edinburgh runs through our area and also the A96 which is the main road to Aberdeen.
